rules_text:
Whenever UX05 Consul G enters the battlefield or transforms into UX05 Consul G, it fights target creature an opponent controls.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with power three or greater, transform UX05 Consul G.
rules_text2:
Trample
Whenever Moebius G attacks, another target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant transform Moebius G. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
